content.en: Machine Learning Predictions: Researchers have been exploring the use of machine learning algorithms to predict various outcomes in patients with acute kidney injury. These algorithms, such as logistic regression, random forest, support vector machine, and extreme gradient boosting, are being used to predict factors like renal replacement therapy-free survival, the risk of rehospitalization, and mortality rates. By analyzing large amounts of data, these algorithms can provide valuable insights and potentially improve patient care in critical situations.
content.da: Maskinlæringsforudsigelser: Forskere har undersøgt brugen af maskinlæringsalgoritmer til at forudsige forskellige resultater hos patienter med akut nyreskade. Disse algoritmer, såsom logistisk regression, random forest, support vector machine og extreme gradient boosting, anvendes til at forudsige faktorer som overlevelse uden behov for renal erstatningsterapi, risikoen for genindlæggelse og dødelighedsrater. Ved at analysere store mængder data kan disse algoritmer give værdifuld indsigt og potentielt forbedre patientplejen i kritiske situationer.
